House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00118
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE ESTABLISHMENT OF DRUG REHABILITATION CENTERS IN EVERY CITY AND PROVINCE THROUGHOUT THE PHILIPPINES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Directs the Department of Health (DOH) to undertake the establishment of a drug rehabilitation center in every city and province in the country.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
